http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: This class represents the top-level feature type. This class is equivalent to GFI_Feature defined in ISO 19156:2011, and it is superclass of all feature types.
The class represents the top-level geometry type. This class is equivalent to the UML class GM_Object defined in ISO 19107, and it is superclass of all geometry types.
The day of week.
A temporal entity with zero extent or duration
A temporal entity with an extent or duration.
Time extent; duration of a time interval separate from its particular start position
A temporal interval or instant.
A device responsible for moving or controlling a mechanism or system.

A tangible object designed to accomplish a particular task in households, common public buildings or offices. In order to accomplish this task, the device performs one or more functions. For example, a washing machine is designed to wash (task) and to accomplish this task it performs a start and stop function. Devices can be structured in categories (subclasses) that reflect the different domain in which a device is used, e.g., smart appliances domain (subclass FunctionRelated) vs. building domain (subclass BuildingRelated) vs. smart grid domain (subclass EnergyRelated). New categories can be defined,if needed, to reflect other differences, for example different points of view, such as the point of view of the device's user vs. the point of view of the device's manufacturer. We propose a list of devices that are relevant for the purpose of SAREF, but this list can be extended.
Represents the measured value made over a property. It is also linked to the unit of measure in which the value is expressed and the timestamp of the measurement.
A device built to accurately detect and display a quantity in a form readable by a human being. Further, a device of category saref:Meter that performs a saref:MeteringFunction.
An aspect of an entity that can be observable by a sensor.

A device that detects and responds to events or changes in the physical environment such as light, motion, or temperature changes. A device that has category saref:Sensor and performs a saref:SensingFunction.

The unit of measure is a standard for measurement of a quantity, such as a Property. For example, Power is a property and Watt is a unit of power that represents a definite predetermined power: when we say 10 Watt, we actually mean 10 times the definite predetermined power called "watt". Our definition is based on the definition of unit of measure in the Ontology of units of Measure (OM). We propose here a list of some units of measure that are relevant for the purpose of the Smart Appliances ontology, but this list can be extended.
A relationship identifying the manufacturer of an entity (e.g., device)
An acceptability property is a property of water that is related to its acceptability.
A chemical property is a property of water that is related to chemical components.
A microbial property is a property of water that is related to microbes.
A pump is a device for moving water by mechanical action.
A valve is a device designed to control water flow, pressure or volume.
This class is used to define a particular quantity or body of water.
A water asset is a physical entity used in the process of transporting, treating, storing and distributing water.
A water device is a device that is also a water asset.
Class to group those properties related to water flow.
A water infrastructure is the set of facilities, services, and installations needed for water management.
A water meter is an instrument intended to measure continuously, memorize, and display the volume of water passing through the meter.
Class to group those properties related to water meters.
Class to group those properties related to the water.
A relationship specifying the devices that control a feature of interest.
A relationship specifying the devices that measure a feature of interest.
The fabrication number of a device.
The firmware version of a device.
The hardware version of a device.
The time for which the value of a measurement applies to the feature of interest.
The version of a device.
The type of water for which an infrastructure is designed for.
The intended use of the infrastructure.
The radio frequency at which a device operates.
The power required by a device.
NGSI-LD Entity
NGSI-LD Property
NGSI-LD Relationship

http://purl.org/dc/terms/description.@value: A SAREF4WATR extenstion to model incidence, emergency response and Risk Assessment modelling. The main intention of the ontology is to interlink water management information with water quality and risk assessment. This ontology has been elaborated under the PATHOCERT H2020 project.

http://purl.org/dc/terms/title.@value: Incidence, Emergency Response and Risk Assessment model

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: This class is used to define a particular air medium.
A air borne disease is a disease transferred by air
A Bacteria property is a property of water that is related to specific bacterias.
A Biological property is a property of water that is related to biological contaminants and pathogens.
a interaction situation that permit to do specific actions over a system or feature of interest.

http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-.@value: A digital tool corresponds to a digital device that offer digital services (information) to monitor water infrastructure.

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: A collection of diseases that can be transferred by different vectors.
a interaction situation that permit to create specific event
a interaction situation between users of digial services .

http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-.@value: A modelling tool is a hydrometereological tool that permit to make simulations and prediction over water infrastructure.

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.@value: a interaction situation that performs an specific notification
A PFAS property is a property of water that is related to PFAS.
A parasites property is a property of water that is related to specific parasites.
A pharmatheutical property is a property of water that is related to specific emerging contaminants.
A Protozoan property is a property of water that is related to specific protozoos.
a situation involving exposure to danger.
A vector borne disease is a disease transferred by animals and ecosystems
A Virus property is a property of water that is related to specific virus.
Weakness in an information system, system security procedures, internal controls, or implementation that could be exploited or triggered by a threat source
A water borne disease is a disease transferred by water
An entity to simulate and predict water quality parameters, including their dispersion
An An aspect of an entity that can be observable by a sensor.
An entity to measure water quality parameters.
